statements.statement: SELECT CC_ID, PROC_DT, CCEXE_NO, PROCOP_NO, PROC_SQ, ORGPROC_SQ, CUS_NO, ACC_NUM, TRX_AMT, PROCSTAT_CD, MOD_DT, REG_DT, MOD_USER_ID, REG_USER_ID, SITE_CD, DO_PARAMETER FROM SERE_CCINTER_CAL_TB WHERE PROC_DT = ${proc_dt} AND CC_ID = ${cc_id} AND CCEXE_NO = ${ccexe_no} AND PROCOP_NO = ${procop_no} AND PROCSTAT_CD IN ('00','02')

INSERT INTO ${proctbl_id:NOT} ( CC_ID, PROC_DT, CCEXE_NO, PROCOP_NO, PROC_SQ, ORGPROC_SQ, CUS_NO, ACC_NUM, TRX_AMT, PROCSTAT_CD, MOD_DT, REG_DT, MOD_USER_ID, REG_USER_ID, SITE_CD, DO_PARAMETER ) VALUES ( ${cc_id}, ${proc_dt}, ${ccexe_no}, ${procop_no}, ${proc_sq}, ${orgproc_sq}, ${cus_no}, ${acc_num}, ${trx_amt}, ${procstat_cd}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MIssFF3'), TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MIssFF3'), ${mod_user_id}, ${reg_user_id}, ${site_cd}, ${do_parameter} )

INSERT INTO SERE_CCSVCMGMT_TB ( CC_ID, PROC_DT, CCEXE_NO, PROCOP_NO, PROCSVC_ID, STRT_SQ, END_SQ, PROC_SQ, PROCSTAT_CD, MOD_DT, REG_DT, MOD_USER_ID, REG_USER_ID, SITE_CD, ALLPROC_NO, NORMPROC_NO, ERRPROC_NO, NOTPROC_NO, NODE_NM, INST_NM ) VALUES ( ${cc_id}, ${proc_dt}, ${ccexe_no}, ${procop_no}, ${procsvc_id}, ${strt_sq}, ${end_sq}, ${proc_sq}, ${procstat_cd}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MIssFF3'), TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MIssFF3'), ${mod_user_id}, ${reg_user_id}, ${site_cd}, ${allproc_no}, ${normproc_no}, ${errproc_no}, ${notproc_no}, ${node_nm}, ${inst_nm} )

INSERT INTO SERE_CCTTZ_TB ( CC_ID, PROC_DT, CCEXE_NO, PROCOP_NO, PREPRSTAT_CD, PROCSTAT_CD, PSTPRSTAT_CD, ALLCCOBJ_NO, MOD_DT, REG_DT, MOD_USER_ID, REG_USER_ID, SITE_CD, CCPNPPROC_NO, NORMPROC_NO, ERRPROC_NO, NOTPROC_NO , STRT_SQ, END_SQ , BATCHPROCSTD_DT ) VALUES ( ${cc_id}, ${proc_dt}, ${ccexe_no}, ${procop_no}, ${preprstat_cd}, ${procstat_cd}, ${pstprstat_cd}, ${allccobj_no}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MIssFF3'), TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MIssFF3'), ${mod_user_id}, ${reg_user_id}, ${site_cd}, ${ccpnpproc_no}, ${normproc_no}, ${errproc_no}, ${notproc_no}, ${strt_sq}, ${end_sq}, ${batchprocstd_dt} )
